name: Sand stone
description:
This is our most "natural" stone. The color is light faded brown and works with a wide range of colors on your clothes. Match it with an oxford shirt in a light color and you'll be the center of attention when it comes to subtle yet distinguished details!


The silver is as always .999 pure silver. 

Apart from 925-sterling silver which contains 925/1000 parts silver, 999/1000 is purer and considered more exclusive.

The sizes are measured around your wrist. Keep in mind the bracelet is somewhat elastic.

name: Lava stone
description:
This is our rawest stone. Extracted from lava and colored by nature, each stone has its own characteristics. The fine detailing on each bead makes this bracelet a favorite. Wear it with a timeless watch and other bracelets to put the S in the WAGGER. 

The silver is as always .999 pure silver. 

Apart from 925-sterling silver which contains 925/1000 parts silver, 999/1000 is purer and considered more exclusive.

The sizes are measured around your wrist. Keep in mind the bracelet is somewhat elastic.

name: Red Jasper
description:
This beautiful deep red color comes from a stone called Jasper. Bracelets of these bright colors really stand out, so wear it with confidence. Together with a laid back t-shirt on the beach or a killer suit in the boardroom - either way you'll have their attention.

The silver is as always .999 pure silver. 

Apart from 925-sterling silver which contains 925/1000 parts silver, 999/1000 is purer and considered more exclusive.

The sizes are measured around your wrist. Keep in mind the bracelet is somewhat elastic.
